articles.title: Meta's new AI chatbot both insults, praises Mark Zuckerberg - Business Insider
articles.description: When asked about CEO Mark Zuckerberg, Meta's AI chatbot gave answers ranging from "I think he is a great guy" to "He's too creepy and manipulative."
articles.content:
Meta's latest AI chatbot is here, and it's already generating some pretty interesting answers to one question in particular.

articles.title: Sony’s comfy LinkBuds S true wireless earbuds are on sale for just $148 - The Verge
articles.description: The Sony LinkBuds S offer a very lightweight feel that’s easier on the ears for longer sessions. They also support active noise cancellation and the newer LDAC codec. All of this is now much cheaper today, around $50 off.
articles.content:
